select * from ( SELECT bl.bId AS bId, u.custno as custNo,u.name as name, u.sex as sex, concat_ws('-',case when a.name!='' then a.name else '[无对象]' end , case when b.name!='' then b.name else '[无对象]' end,case when r.name!='' then r.name else '[无对象]' end) as OtherName,bl.charge AS charge, bl.currentBalance AS currentBalance, to_char(bl.optTime,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') AS optTime,case when bl.optMan='sys' then '系统' end ,case when length(o.operator_name)>0 then o.operator_name end, case when o.operator_name!=null then bl.optMan end AS caoZuoRen,u.mobil as mobil, u.tel as tel, u.bank as bank,u.account as account FROM ((((ha_billRecords bl LEFT JOIN ha_operator o ON bl.optMan=o.operator_code) LEFT JOIN ha_custom u ON u.custid=bl.custid) LEFT JOIN ha_room r ON r.custid=u.custid) LEFT JOIN ha_building b ON r.buildingid=b.buildingid) LEFT JOIN ha_area a ON b.areaid=a.areaid WHERE (bl.operation='收费' OR bl.operation='恢复收费')
AND a.areaid = ${HaBillrecords.nodeIds}
AND POSITION(#{HaBillrecords.nodeIds} in Left(a.areaNo, 1))>0
and to_char(bl.optTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') between '${HaBillrecords.kaiShi}' and '${HaBillrecords.JieShu}'
and (bl.bId = '${HaBillrecords.keyWord}' or u.custno like '%${HaBillrecords.keyWord}%' or u.name like '%${HaBillrecords.keyWord}%')
ORDER BY u.custno,to_char(bl.optTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') ) t

SELECT case when Count(br1.bId)> (SELECT Count(br2.bId) FROM ha_billRecords br2 WHERE br2.operation='恢复收费' AND #{custId}=br2.custid AND '${charge}'=to_char(br2.charge, '0.00')) then 'true' else 'false' end FROM ha_billRecords br1 WHERE br1.operation='收费' AND to_char(br1.charge, '0.00')='${charge}' AND br1.custid=#{custId}
